titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson, 17th Light Dragoons, to James Dowe [sic]

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the payment of British forces in the Persian Gulf. Thompson writes that he has recovered to a 'great degree' from the voyage to Muscat, and reports that he has received Dow's communications with Captain Gray on the subject of funds raised at Bushire. Thompson states that the details of some expenses have not been received, and therefore requests a copy of the missing account at the first opportunity.
